divs: Sighting DetailsOne night as I lay on my back, playing my guitar, on a lounge chair under the night sky there it was. It appeared from the west heading east. There was two giant oak trees to the west. It appeared over them and I was in awe. Kinda dumb-founded. As it headed east it was coming to the tree line to the east. So I layed my guitar down and ran to the road on the south and watched it as it slowly floated east. Then all of a sudden, it just turned off. Nothing was there. I tell you that it was shaped as a rectangle. A rectangle of light. All of it and it was silent. I have never seen nothing like it and have never seen nothing like it again. To clear things up.....I took an IQ. test and rated 139, which is a genius level, so I know I am not nuts like some have suggested and laughed about my story. Oh well, I hope that you find this story as fascinating as I always have. sincerely, Larry
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around November 30th 1984
Summary: Silent Rectangle of Light in the Sky
